title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1837/90 of 29 June 1990 fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the reference prices for pears
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1837/90
of 29 June 1990
fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the reference prices for pears
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1990/91 marketing year, the reference prices for pears (CN codes 0808 20 31, 0808 20 33, 0808 20 35 and 0808 20 39) expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class 1, of all sizes, shall be as follows;
July: 47,03
August: 39,96
September: 39,66
October: 42,86
November: 45,94
December: 49,29
January to April inclusive: 51,33

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
